definition: thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Control group were not treated with sensory reeducation or oral intake of methycobal.
sentences.chinese: 對照組未給予感覺再訓練及口服彌可保片劑治療。

sentences.english: Confirming that the split tablet portions meet the USP Friability requirement.
sentences.chinese: 確認刻痕片劑部分滿足USP脆碎度要求。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a rapid method of identifying some drug tablets by infrared spectrophotometry .
sentences.chinese: 目的建立快速鑑別藥物片劑的紅外分光光度法。

sentences.english: Orient the large side of the basket tangentially to the flow stream with the Tablet standing on its edge.
sentences.chinese: 使籃子的大邊和邊角的片劑一起垂直的朝向水流。

sentences.english: No tablet coatings, diluents, binders, granulators, disintegrators or colors.
sentences.chinese: 無片劑外層，稀釋劑，膠合物，成粒子和分解素。

sentences.english: In this paper troche medicine of ligustrazine phosphate has been quantitative analysis.
sentences.chinese: 並用此方法對藥品磷酸川芎嗪片劑進行了分析。

sentences.english: The method was applied to determine 6-MP in tablets with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 該法已用於片劑中的巰嘌呤含量的測定。

sentences.english: Packaging Machines for Grain, Liquid, Powder and Tablet.
sentences.chinese: 全自動顆粒，液體，粉劑和片劑等包裝機。

sentences.english: So do makers of iodine pills who fear losing their market.
sentences.chinese: 而擔心失去市場的碘片劑生產商也反對加碘鹽。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The domestic and imported zolmitriptan tablets are bioequivalent.
sentences.chinese: 結論國產與進口佐米曲坦片劑爲生物等效製劑。

sentences.english: Great tasting chewable, strawberry-vanilla flavoured tablet.
sentences.chinese: 美味咀嚼，草莓，香草味的片劑。

sentences.english: To combat filariasis, health workers usually prescribe DEC tablets.
sentences.chinese: 爲了治療絲蟲病，衛生工作者通常會使用DEC片劑。

sentences.english: Aripiprazole is in tablet and liquid form.
sentences.chinese: 阿立哌唑有片劑和口腔崩解片兩種。

sentences.english: She supplements her diet with vitamin tablets.
sentences.chinese: 她服用維生素片劑以補充規定食譜中的營養。

sentences.english: More insidious, Dr. Sharmanov said, were private companies that sold iodine pills.
sentences.chinese: 沙曼諾夫指出，銷售碘片劑的私人公司更是暗中作梗。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for determination of Famciclovir in tablet and capsule.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立泛韋洛韋片劑和膠囊劑含量的測定方法。

definition: to desensitize/to remove an allergic susceptibility
